While the game itself is well made however, since going Free-2-Play the game has been infested with Cheaters and this detracts from the tactical gameplaty it provides. much like TF2 the dev team or Valve itself needs to improve its Anti-Cheat engine or have a quicker and more effective way of removing cheaters from matches.
